methods: void abandon() Completely abandon this session, destroying all staged data and rendering it invalid.
void close() Release this session object.
void commit(IntentSender statusReceiver) Attempt to commit everything staged in this session.
void fsync(OutputStream out) Ensure that any outstanding data for given stream has been committed to disk.
String[] getNames() Return all APK names contained in this session.
InputStream openRead(String name) Open a stream to read an APK file from the session.
OutputStream openWrite(String name, long offsetBytes, long lengthBytes) Open a stream to write an APK file into the session.
void setStagingProgress(float progress) Set current progress of staging this session.
